# identifier

**Instance Property**

The unique identifier for this intent object.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

SiriKit generates a UUID for this property at creation time and it can’t be changed later. You can use this value in your app to identify the specific request made by the user.

## Accessing Intent Information

- **intentDescription**: A string describing the content of the intent.
- **suggestedInvocationPhrase**: The intent’s display name.
- **shortcutAvailability**: A set of defined contexts in which an intent or activity might be relevant to a user.
